title: Brady Quinn on NFC East race, NFL's best team (Football 11/13)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Brady Quinn to break down the latest storylines from around the NFL, including the wide open NFC East race and whether Washington can hold on (2:30), the Redskins formula for winning (10:15), what Philadelphia misses the most (13:45), if the Saints are the best team in football (19:40), whether the Rams defense is a concern (25:00), Derek Carr and the Raiders (29:00), the Giants beating the 49ers (34:15), the importance of matching coach + quarterback (37:00) and the Titans big win over the Patriots and why Bill Belichick's assistants are beating him (39:00). 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
